textContent:
---rotting in bed---

Madaming beses tayo nagkita this week bby!!! I'm so happy HUHUHU. (Pero syempre kulang pa). We met for. Total of 4 times!! Sunday, Monday, Thursday, and Friday!!! Tas nag chicken wings pa tayo NYAM!!! 

Nag nanap ka ngayon at work and wala lang. Namiss ko lang bigla having you at my bed habang ako nagmemeeting hahaha. I miss having you around. Kahit na wala man tayong ginagawa. Kahit na di man tayo nag uusap. Your presence alone is enough to bring me happiness. Pag nag memeeting kame, sometimes sisilip ako sa webcam ko tas nakikita kita sa likod ko hahaha. Either nagnanap ka or naglalaro or nag phophone hahaha. I'm excited for the day wherein I get to experience that everyday. I'm excited for the day na nagrorot tayo in our bed. Not mine. Not yours. But ours. I love you so much Rei!!

---insecurities---

At dahil nga di tayo nagkita kahapon (nakakainis talaga HAHAHAHA), nakuha pa naten mag open up ng insecurities HAHAHAHAHA. I just want you to know bby na whatever happens, I'll always like you and love you and you'll always remain the most beautiful person in my eyes. 

Pero at the same time, I want you to feel confident and secure and happy with yourself kaya fighting bby!!!! I like you most when you are confident. It's one of the things talaga na I first liked about you. Alam ko namention ko yon sa previous letters eh. 

If want mo talaga magpapayat then I'll support you every step of the way!!! Basta take it slowly okii? You're in no rush!! And what's important is that you're still happy with your life ket na nagpapayat ka na HAHAHAH. Wag na wag moko gagayahin hahahaha.

---cuddling with you---

When I rot in bed, with you by my side,
You make so happy, my future bride,
I feel so calm, like I could sleep all day,
Your gentle touch, makes it easy to stay.

When I look at you, as you lay by my side,
You make my cheeks blush, my heart takes a stride,
I feel so much bliss, I could see the tomorrows,
A future where you and I feel no sorrow
title: March 24, 2024
textContentHtml:
---rotting in bed---


Madaming beses tayo nagkita this week bby!!! I'm so happy HUHUHU. (Pero syempre kulang pa). We met for. Total of 4 times!! Sunday, Monday, Thursday, and Friday!!! Tas nag chicken wings pa tayo NYAM!!! 


Nag nanap ka ngayon at work and wala lang. Namiss ko lang bigla having you at my bed habang ako nagmemeeting hahaha. I miss having you around. Kahit na wala man tayong ginagawa. Kahit na di man tayo nag uusap. Your presence alone is enough to bring me happiness. Pag nag memeeting kame, sometimes sisilip ako sa webcam ko tas nakikita kita sa likod ko hahaha. Either nagnanap ka or naglalaro or nag phophone hahaha. I'm excited for the day wherein I get to experience that everyday. I'm excited for the day na nagrorot tayo in our bed. Not mine. Not yours. But ours. I love you so much Rei!!


---insecurities---


At dahil nga di tayo nagkita kahapon (nakakainis talaga HAHAHAHA), nakuha pa naten mag open up ng insecurities HAHAHAHAHA. I just want you to know bby na whatever happens, I'll always like you and love you and you'll always remain the most beautiful person in my eyes. 


Pero at the same time, I want you to feel confident and secure and happy with yourself kaya fighting bby!!!! I like you most when you are confident. It's one of the things talaga na I first liked about you. Alam ko namention ko yon sa previous letters eh. 


If want mo talaga magpapayat then I'll support you every step of the way!!! Basta take it slowly okii? You're in no rush!! And what's important is that you're still happy with your life ket na nagpapayat ka na HAHAHAH. Wag na wag moko gagayahin hahahaha.


---cuddling with you---


When I rot in bed, with you by my side,

You make so happy, my future bride,

I feel so calm, like I could sleep all day,

Your gentle touch, makes it easy to stay.


When I look at you, as you lay by my side,
